About us

Founded in 2010, By an ex-Microsoft 'techie' with no money but truckloads of relentless passion to make a difference in this world, Lenskart is India's fastest growing eyewear business today. With a rapidly growing business reaching out to over 1,00,000 customers a month via a unique combination of a strong online business as www.lenskart.com, uniquely designed physical stores, as well as a first of its kind 'home eye check up' service, Lenskart is revolutionizing the eyewear industry in india.

Our service

We're Delivering Eyeglasses, Sunglasses, and Contact Lenses Across India. Order Online and Get Hygienically Made Eyewear Delivered Safely at your Doorstep. Guaranteed Satisfaction. Cash On Delivery. Easy Returns. Styles: Aviators, Wayfarers, Clubmaster.

Our recent work

The aim was in truly add 'valyoo' in customers' lives by eliminating the retailers, setting up our own high quality manufacturing and supply directly to the consumer everywhere in India. This not only cuts costs,but also helps us maintain high quality standards. Our in house robotic lens manufacturing and assembling ensures 100% precision and top quality control. Offering the best quality products at affordable prices helped us grow more than 200% in the last 2 years and we are among the top 3 optical businesses in India today. From servicing 30 customers per day to more than 3000 today, we have came a long way. Our commitment to consumer satisfaction and innovative technologies has given us tremendous support from those who believe in our cause.
